This is the Sumerian name of the legendary king of Uruk, one of the most famous figures in ancient Mesopotamian literature. The name appears in the Epic of Gilgamesh and various Sumerian literary compositions. The Sumerian form "gilgamesh" (also written as bilgames or pabilgames in some texts) is the original form of the name later rendered as Gilgamesh in Akkadian.
